assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Mastek Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides enterprise technology solutions. The company offers business and technology services comprising application development, ERP and cloud migration, digital commerce, application support and maintenance, business intelligence and analytics, agile consulting, testing and assurance, and legacy modernization. It also provides data warehousing and enterprise digital transformation services. The company serves customers spanning government, healthcare, defense, retail, and financial services sectors in India, the United Kingdom, the Middle East, the Asia Pacific, the United States, and internationally. Mastek Limited was founded in 1982 and is based in Mumbai, India.
